title: Ubisoft Grows Up
itunes:title: Ubisoft Grows Up
description:
After emerging from one potential hostile takeover, Ubisoft would find itself in another. And then in 2020, the company was rocked with scandal. In this episode, we learn what happened from 2011 to 2020 at the video game company.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
